entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • xamarin_process_managed_exception caused by MainPage initialization #14626
  • ScrollView content with Buttons rendered offscreen do not respond on iOS #14624
  • Image Loaded Event isn't called under certain conditions on IOS #14622
  • iOS app is crashing while tap any key on keyboard #14621
  • [Android] Unable to tap clear button in Entry when inside a Grid #14620
  • [Non-Shell] Toolbar items are affected from previous page on Android #14617
    Backlog
  • FlyoutMenuPage is tap-throughable (on Android) #14609
  • Unable to show images in a collection view due to layout issues #14606

Closed

  • [regression/7.0.81] Grid can't use star and auto together in version 7.0.81 #14520
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Partial classes and methods not working for .net maui library #14601
  • Entry Layout broken after Update .NET MAUI to 7.0.81 #14562
  • "Pair to Mac" in Visual Studio 2022 not working when Mac is behind proxy with authentication #14534
  • Enable using Safari dev tools with BlazorWebView #14590
    8.0-preview4
  • Pipeline commands fail with a dependency on maui-tizen #11579
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Windows] Can't include MAUI and WinForms in the same project #6450
    Backlog
  • Still cannot build in Release mode on Android with AOT and trimming disabled #14605
  • x:Array as resource with key crashes app on device launch #9422
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Android]: CollectionView header template is not rendered #14603
  • [Android] RuntimeException: Canvas: trying to draw too large bitmap #14604
  • Opening Maui Blazor Hybrid Project Properties Crashes #14602
  • Photo orientation #14607
  • Moving MAUI Window between monitors with different scalling has issues #14597
  • On iOS Property InputTransparent=true does not work for LABEL #14124
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [graphics] fix CA1307 and CA1309 for performance #14627
  • [controls] fix performance issue in {AppThemeBinding} #14625
    area/collectionview 📃, area/controls 🎮
  • Set menuItem show action back to Never #14623
    backport/suggested
  • [iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse #14619
  • [Android] Fix IsEnabled property on Android SearchBar #14616
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix issue in Entry Drawable using API Level 23 #14615
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Optimize iOS selection synchronization #14613

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1722.32 to 1.0.1722.45 #14584
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add updated WKWebView Inspectable flag #14610
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [xaml] fix x:Array and x:Double in Release mode #14546
    area/Xaml </>, backport/suggested
  • [net7.0] Try fix ems on net7 #14614
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [net7.0] [Android] Properly remove the Frame's border thickness #14565
    area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • Support both Update and Include for maui #14576
    area/setup 🪄
  • Add Xceed partners #14571
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix Layout issues with the details page on Flyout #12909
    area/layout 🔲, partner/cat 😻, backport/suggested
  • Make Benchmarks.Droid runnable as APK for perf testing #14447
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Added ICommandMapper for extension methods #14545
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, do-not-merge, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • Allow SearchBar to take full width on Android #13716
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Centralize logic for handling logical children #14132
